mapper.insert: insert into discussion values(discussion_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{caution}, #{language}, default, default, default, default)
mapper.select: select * from ( select discussion.*, row_number() over(order by seq desc) rnum from discussion ) where rnum between 1 and 10
mapper.update: update discussion set view_count = view_count+1 where seq = #{seq}
update discussion set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, caution = #{caution}, language = #{language} where seq = ${seq}
mapper.insert: insert into commentTb values(commentTb_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{contents}, #{category}, default, #{opinion}, default, default, ${parent_seq})
mapper.update: update discussion set like_count = like_count+1 where seq = #{parent_seq}
update discussion set comment_count = comment_count+1 where seq = #{parent_seq}
update commentTb set like_count = like_count+1 where seq=#{value}
update commentTb set hate_count = hate_count+1 where seq=#{value}
mapper.select: select * from (select commentTb.*, row_number() over(order by like_count desc) rnum from commentTb where parent_seq = #{parent_seq} and like_count > 0) where rnum between 1 and 3
